context: As part of a security incident where multiple known public tools, which could be used for malicious reasons, were dropped on this device, we observed various processes such as `mimikatz.exe`, `powershell.exe`, and `psexec.exe` being executed. One of the processes involved, `domaindominance27.ps1`, was run using PowerShell. This incident likely involves credential theft, privilege escalation, and lateral movement.
question: Can you provide the command line associated with the execution of the known credential theft tool detected in this incident?
solution_steps: Multiple dual-purpose tools were dropped on the device using account with SID `S-5-7-21-1843151660-3234030288-105586167-1422`.

A malicious credential theft tool (mimikatz) was executed with the command line `mimikatz.exe lsadump::dcsync /domain:vnevado.alpineskihouse.co /user:xfbzkp exit` at `2024-06-27t14:33:38.0249949z`, with Process ID `4748`.
